text: tumamen se jo log (doosaron ko jihaad se) rokate hain khuda unako khoob jaanata hai aur (unako bhee khoob jaanata hai) jo apane bhaee bandon se kahate hain ki hamaare paas chale bhee aao aur khud bhee (phaqat peechha chhudaane ko ladaee ke khet) mein bas ek zara sa aakar tumase apanee jaan churaee
